Title: Number of tables
Description: The system will support 6 tables.

Title: Number of seats per table
Description: The system will support 4 seats per table.

Title: List of entrees
Description: The system will support the following entrees

Title: List Steak as option
Description: Steak as an option

Title: List Lobster as option
Description: Lobster as an option

Title: List Chicken as option
Description: Chicken as an option

Title: List Pasta as option
Description: Pasta as an option

Title: List None as option
Description: None as an option

Title: Placing an order updates occupied status
Description: Placing an order updates the table's occupied status to true within the table database.

Title: Placing an order updates number in party
Description: Placing an order updates the table's number in party within the table database.

Title: Placing an order updates a seat's order
Description: Placing an order updates the seat's order within the table database.

Title: Placing an order updates check total
Description: Placing an order increases the table's check total within the table database by an amount depending on the entree ordered according to the following schedule:

Title: Update for Steak Price
Description: Lobster shall be $14

Title: Update for Lobster Price
Description: Lobster shall be $18

Title: Update for Chicken Price
Description: Lobster shall be $10

Title: Update for Pasta Price
Description: Lobster shall be $12

Title: Update for None Price
Description: Lobster shall be $0

Title: Clearing a table resets occupied status
Description: Clearing a table updates the table's occupied status to false within the table database.

Title: Clearing a table resets number in party
Description: Clearing a table updates the table's number in party to 0 within the table database.

Title: Clearing a table resets orders for all seats
Description: Clearing a table clears the orders for all seats of the table within the table database.

Title: Clearing a table resets check total
Description: Clearing a table updates the table's check total to 0.0 within the table database.

Title: Obtaining check total
Description: The system will provide a way to obtain the check total for a given table.

Title: Size of waiting list
Description: The system will support a waiting list of up to 10 parties.

Title: Adding a party to waiting list
Description: The system will provide a means of adding a party to the waiting list

Title: Getting the head of the waiting list
Description: The system will provide a means of obtaining the name of the party at the head of the waiting list.  with the party specified by name.

Title: Adding free dessert
Description: Placing certain orders will qualify the seat for free dessert according to the following schedule

Title: Free Pie
Description: Steak with caesar salad and a mixed drink qualifies a seat for pie

Title: Free Cake
Description: Lobster with green salad and wine qualifies a seat for cake.
